name: Black Rose & Oud Extra-Strength Aluminum-Free Deodorant
categories: Bath & Body, Body Care, Deodorant & Antiperspirant
about: What it is: An extra strength, aluminum-free deodorant formulated for up to 24 hours of protection...Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Balm..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Classic Woods..Key Notes: Black Rose, Vetiver, Oud..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Probiotics: Balance skin’s microbiome to neutralize odor and replenish healthy bacteria..- Spirulina: An antioxidant-rich superfood that soothes irritated skin..- Hyaluronic Acid: An ultra-hydrating humectant able to retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture...What Else You Need to Know: This high-performance deodorant is formulated for all day protection. It’s an extra strength solid deodorant formulated without aluminum, alcohol, parabens, or phthalates in an intoxicating and centering scent, Black Rose & Oud. Seaweed extracts and hyaluronic acid soothe and moisturize the skin while probiotics neutralize odor by balancing bacteria...
ingredients: -Probiotics: Balance skin’s microbiome to neutralize odor and replenish healthy bacteria..-Spirulina: An antioxidant-rich superfood that soothes irritated skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: An ultra-hydrating humectant able to retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture...Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tapioca Starch, Magnesium Hydroxide, Sodium Bicarbonate, Ozokerite, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Fragrance (Parfum), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lactobacillus Ferment, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean, dry skin..-For external use only, avoid contact with eyes..-Do not apply to broken skin...Recycling Instructions:.-Recyclable packaging made from recovered ocean plastic and other recycled materials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of it so much and for being an aluminum free deodorant I was so surprised at how good it works, even after sweating in the gym  I did apply this right after shaving one time and it did cause a lot of irritation so just something to be careful of
